title: How big is the new patch?
body:
Could someone please tell me how big the update will be in mb's so I know if i need to get more data or not.

Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
Oof, I actually don't know how bug the update is, but I'd say leave a buffer of ~2GB just to be safe. The amount shown on the patcher is simply an estimation, so I wouldn't use it as a *direct number*. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
Mine took under 400 mb, so there is that.
